step.script:
## enter workdir pushd . cd ${log.dir}
for loop_idx in 1 2 3 do
echo Round $loop_idx clear begin... date ## show_result_file=__AP___show_all_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.log cli_init_file=__AP___init_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.txt cli_split1_file=__AP___split1_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.txt cli_split2_file=__AP___split2_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.txt cli_tmpfile=__AP___tmpcli_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.txt
disable_cli_file=__AP___disable_cli_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.txt
## show running config: begin console.py -w 0.5 -o 60 -d ${__AP__.conserver.ip} -e ${__AP__.cons_name} -z "$show_result_file" -v "show run" -v "show _ff" -v "show run user" if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "console operation failed!" exit 1; fi
## get the normal CLI cat $show_result_file |sed -n '/#show run$/,/AH.*#/p' |sed '1d'|sed '$d'|sed "/console page 0/d" > $cli_init_file
## get the special CLI, show _ff cat $show_result_file |sed -n '/#show _ff$/,/AH.*#/p' |sed '1d'|sed '$d'|sed "s/^/_ff /" >> $cli_init_file
## get the special CLI, show run user cat $show_result_file |sed -n '/#show run user$/,/AH.*#/p' |sed '1d'|sed '$d' >> $cli_init_file
if [ ! -s $cli_init_file ]; then echo "No anymore CLIs, clear finished!" date break; fi
## generate the noCLIs cat $cli_init_file | grep ^no > $cli_split1_file
## generate the pure cli1 cat $cli_init_file | grep -v ^no > $cli_split2_file
## generate the disable CLIs cat $cli_split1_file | sed 's/^no //' > $disable_cli_file
if [ $loop_idx -eq 1 ]; then cat $cli_split2_file > $cli_tmpfile fi
if [ $loop_idx -eq 2 ]; then cat $cli_split2_file | awk '{$NF="";$(NF-1)="";print}' > $cli_tmpfile cat $cli_split2_file >> $cli_tmpfile fi
if [ $loop_idx -eq 3 ]; then cat $cli_split2_file | awk '{$NF="";$(NF-1)="";$(NF-2)="";$(NF-3)="";print}' > $cli_tmpfile fi
## generate depth 0 and depth 1 disable CLI file #on round 2 or 3 ##if [ $loop_idx -eq 2 -o $loop_idx -eq 3 ]; then echo "disable_cli_file before tac " cat $disable_cli_file tac $cli_tmpfile |sed 's/^/no /g' | uniq >> $disable_cli_file tac $cli_tmpfile |awk '{$NF="";print}'|sed 's/^/no /g' | uniq >> $disable_cli_file echo "disable_cli_file after tac " cat $disable_cli_file echo "end tac " ##fi
## special process if [ $loop_idx -eq 2 ]; then cat $cli_tmpfile | awk '{print "no "$1" "$2}' | uniq >> $disable_cli_file cat $cli_tmpfile | awk '{print "no "$1" "$2" "$3}' | uniq >> $disable_cli_file fi
## special cli append disable clis to $disable_cli_file #echo "no aaa radius-server local ldap-auth primary" >> $disable_cli_file #echo "no aaa radius-server local sta-auth ca-cert" >> $disable_cli_file echo "the content of disable_cli_file before sed -i " cat $disable_cli_file sed -i -r -f ${auto.root.dir}/subs/conf/disable_cli_remv_sed_lib.txt $disable_cli_file echo "the content of disable_cli_file after sed -i " cat $disable_cli_file echo "the content end"
echo "console page 22" >> $disable_cli_file echo "no _kdebug all" >> $disable_cli_file echo "no _debug all" >> $disable_cli_file echo "save config" >> $disable_cli_file
console.py -w 1 -o 60 -d ${__AP__.conserver.ip} -e ${__AP__.cons_name} -z "__AP___cli_clear_${include.prefix}_$loop_idx.log" -f $disable_cli_file if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "console operation failed!" exit 1; fi
# echo Round $loop_idx clear end! date echo done
## exit dir popd

step.console: -v "" -v "console page 22" -v "save config" -v "show running-config" -v "show _ff" -v "show run user" -v "_show kdebug info" -v "_show debug info" -v ""
